entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then light snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning then to periods of drizzle late in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
